home.title: Welcome to StellarNews
home.description: Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of astronomy and space news with StellarNews, a go-to source for all the latest news, discoveries and exciting information on the mysteries of the cosmos.

apod.title: Astronomy Picture of the Day
apod.subtitle: Discover the cosmos! Each day a different image or photograph of our fascinating universe is featured, along with a brief explanation written by a professional astronomer.

x-user.title: Follow these accounts to stay informed of their latest news
